titles.title: To direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to issue an order regarding secondary cockpit barriers.
To direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to issue an order regarding secondary cockpit barriers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

bill.summary: Directs the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to issue an order requiring: (1) the installation of secondary cockpit barriers preventing access to the flight deck of commercial aircraft; and (2) that such secondary barriers remain locked while the aircraft is in flight and the cockpit door separating the flight deck and the passenger area is open.
